fields.name: **Curse Mark**:
fields.value: Visit one player. They become marked for Unleash Chaos. After using this ability twice, permanently unlock Unleash Chaos.

fields.name: **Eclipse Madness (1x)**:
fields.value: Prevent all of the abilities targeting your target from taking affect, and then use Curse Mark on them. Everyone whose ability was blocked will learn that an Apocalypse did it.

fields.name: **Unleash Chaos (Locked)**:
fields.value: Astrally attack all living players that you have targeted with Curse Mark. If they survive, the Mark is not removed. Defense boosts that were given in ways other than the Evening Bonus are ignored by this attack.

fields.name: **Unstoppable Carnage (Passive)**:
fields.value: If at least three players are marked, you cannot be stopped from using Unleash Chaos.
